procedure.p: We support the following types of licenses:

list.li: Free licenses (as a part of community support program or custom offers).

procedure.p: More information can be found here.
Users can choose one of the following licensing schemes:

list.li: Yearly/monthly subscription with a fallback license (similar to JetBrains Toolbox model, see this article about the fallback license).
Yearly/monthly subscription without a fallback license (can use the product only when there is an active subscription.)

li.p: Users will pay once and will get access to your plugin updates for a lifetime. This model can be attractive to users who prefer to make a single payment and use the plugin indefinitely.
